text: Rahatul Ferdous (born 10 May 1995) is a Bangladeshi first-class cricketer. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:People from Sylhet Category:Mohammedan Sporting Club cricketers Category:Prime Doleshwar Sporting Club cricketers Category:Bangladesh East Zone cricketers Category:Bangladesh under-19 cricketers
title: Rahatul Ferdous
